evaluation_instruction: You should evaluate the summaries to this news article in terms of syntax, style and personality. It should be as they were written by the same person.
system_prompt_role_description: Instruction and style how to summarize the news article. Should be at most 200 words.
news_string_role_description: String containing company monthly news that we want to summarize
answer_role_description: A summary of the news article by the director of the company
